courses.title: Life and Physical Sciences
courses.notes: May apply pending course selection. See General Education Core for course options. 1 credit hour of lab may apply to category 090. Consider BIOL 1406 General Biology I, BIOL 1407 General Biology II, CHEM 1311 General Chemistry I, and CHEM 1312 General Chemistry II, depending on chosen career path.

courses.title: Mathematics
courses.prerequisite: College Ready TSI status in Mathematics or MATH 0314/0332/0342.
courses.notes: See General Education Core for course options. Consider MATH 1342 Elementary Statistical Methods or MATH 2413 Calculus, depending on chosen career path.

courses.title: Global Health and Social Justice
courses.notes: Students who have completed this core curriculum category with a course other than ANTH 2311 will still be required to take ANTH 2311 to meet major requirements.

courses.title: Ethics, Health, and Culture
courses.notes: Students who have completed this core curriculum category with a course other than PHIL 2322 will still be required to take PHIL 2322 to meet major requirements.

courses.title: Learning Framework
courses.notes: As required, based on credit hours earned, TSI status, High School rank, major declaration.

courses.title: Life and Physical Sciences
courses.notes: May apply pending course selection. See General Education Core for course options. 1 credit hour of lab may apply to category 090. courses.title: Communication
courses.prerequisite: For all 010 courses: Satisfactory scores on English portion of ACT test and TSI examination or ENGL 0301. For ENGL 1302, a grade of 'C' or better in ENGL 1301.
